data.title: Music Box
data.meta_description:

data.text:
Music and magic have always had a harmonious relationship, but few effects blend them as beautifully as "Music Box".

This simple and easy-to-use prop allows you to audibly reveal a song that was secretly selected by a spectatorâ€”creating a powerful and unforgettable moment. Every song included with the music box is instantly recognizable, bringing wonderful memories, emotions and joy to life with every performance.

There are a variety of different handlings taught to satisfy every perfomer from traditional prediction-style effects to feats of mind-reading where you physically punch the individual holes in the music strip as their thoughts are transmitted to you.

"Music Box" offers so much potential to let your creativity shine.

Two versions of Music Box are available!

Both versions comes with:

Music Box

2 special strips of paper

25 strips of music paper

Song cards

Special Hole puncher

PLEASE NOTE: The Standard Version has just the music box while the Premium Version comes with the wooden outer box.

The Standard Version includes 10 songs:

Ed sheeran - Perfect

Beatles - Hey Jude

Aqua - Barbie Girl

Happy Birthday

Twinkle Twinkle Little Star

Wish you a Merry Christmas

Jingle Bells

Stars Wars Theme song

Super Mario Brothers

Tetris

The Premium Version features 20 songs (10 standard songs + 10 bonus songs):

Coldplay - The Scientist

Passenger - Let her Go

Christina Perri - A Thousand Years

Leonard Cohen - Hallelujah

A Whole New World - Aladdin

Pirates of the Caribbean Theme Song

Titanic Theme Song

Harry Potter Theme Song

Jurassic Park Theme Song

Mission Impossible Theme Song
